CustomField.description: This is formula field to calculate absolute difference between the current reading and last reading.
CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISNULL(SVMXC__Counter_Reading__c) || ISNULL(SVMXC__Last_Reading__c)), ABS( SVMXC__Last_Reading__c - SVMXC__Counter_Reading__c ) , 0 )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is formula field to calculate absolute difference between the current reading and last reading.
CustomField.label: Difference
